a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: The number of infections from eradicable diseases, World, 1920 to 2017
This includes the number of smallpox infections, a disease which was declared eradicated in 1980. More infectious
diseases exist but they are not considered eradicable in the near future.
Source: WHO (2018), Tebbens et al. (2011), IHME (2016)
Note: No data exists on Rinderpest, a non-human disease that was eradicated in 2011.
